text: Hahaha Happy to hear that it was useful!

I'm trying to nest some fields in a module but for some reason when trying to iterate through only the parent fields are being located. You will notice the nested ones have yellow underlines and throwing errors. Everything worked fine until I started nesting items. I've been banging my head on this too long was hoping someone could spot what I'm doing wrong. Thanks
"SOLVED" Incase anyone sees this it is because I'm working with repeater fields so the nested group must also have "repeater" enabled in the settings for the group field.
